member.name: T:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumn
member.summary: Represents a column of Controls consisting of ControlRows.

remarks.para: A ControlColumn is a definition of the logically contained Labels column and Controls columns. These are defined by the LabelsWidth and ControlsWidth properties.
Index - A unique value which defines the relative position of the ControlColumn in the Dialog.
LabelsWidth - The width of the widest Label in the Labels column. The Label width is calculated from the Label Text value. The Label controls are left aligned to the Dialog BorderHorizontal value.

ControlsWidth - The width of the widest data Control in the Controls column. This is usually a TextBox control. The Control width is calculated from the Control MaxLength property. The controls are left aligned to the associated Labels column.
RowCount - Contains the count of the ControlRows in that ControlColumn.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumn.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique Index value.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumn.LabelsWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the Labels column width.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumn.ControlsWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the Controls column width.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumn.RowCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of ControlRows.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumnsHelper.CreateConfigControlColumns(LJCNetCommon.DbColumns)
member.summary: Sets the ControlColumn values using a configuration XML file.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumnsHelper.CalculateColumnsCount(System.Int32)
member.remarks:
Calculates the ControlColumn count based on the number of dataValues and the initial ColumnRowsLimit.
Recalculates the ColumnRowsLimit to evenly distribute the values.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumnsHelper.ConfigRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the ConfigRows value.

member.name: T:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumns
member.summary: Represents a collection of ControlColumn objects.
member.remarks: The ControlColumns object is the main layout definition object. The ControlColumn items contain the ControlRows object which is the other main layout definition object.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumns.#ctor
member.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumns.Serialize(System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the collection to a file.
member.remarks: Uses the DefaultFileName value if the fileSpec parameter is null.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlColumns.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the item by index value.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlHelper.#ctor
member.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Default Label height.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Default TextBox height.

member.name: T:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow
member.summary: Represents the controls for a DataValue.

remarks.para: A ControlRow is a definition of the contained RowLabel and RowControl controls. A ControlRow is created for each Data Record value. The controls in a ControlRow are top aligned based on the Dialog BorderVertical, ControlRowSpacing and ControlRowHeight values.
DataValueName - The name of the Data Record value in the DataValues collection. The DataValues property is a DbColumns collection object.
RowLabel - A reference to the row Label control.
RowControl - A reference to the row data control.
TabPageIndex - The TabPage where the ControlRow is displayed.
ColumnIndex - The ControlColumn where the ControlRow is displayed.
RowIndex - The row index where the Label and data Controls are displayed.
TabIndex - The tabbing index for the Label control in the ControlRow.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow.#ctor
member.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow.Clone
member.summary: Clones the structure of the object.
member.returns: A new object with the same structure as the current object.

member.name: M:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow.CompareTo(LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow)
member.returns: The integer that indicates the order relationship of the objects.
member.remarks:
A negative integer - This instance precedes the compare-to object.
Zero - This instance and the compare-to object have the same position.
A postive integer - This instance follows the compare-to object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ControlColumn index.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DataValue name.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Row Control value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ControlRow index.

member.name: P:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRow.RowLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the Row Label value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ControlRow Tabbing Index.

member.summary: Gets or sets the TabPage index.

member.returns: An integer value indicating the order relationship.

member.name: T:LJCDataDetailLib.ControlRows
member.summary: Represents a collection of ControlRow objects.
member.remarks: The ControlRows is one of the main layout definition objects. ControlRows belong to a ControlColumn in the ControlColumns collection which is the other main layout definition object.
